attributes.action: Introduce a legal maximum workplace temperature and heat mitigation measures
attributes.additional_details: UK heatwaves are getting worse, yet there’s no legal max working temperature. Workers face unsafe heat, risking health and productivity. We need a sensible legal limit and measures like air con or breaks to protect people’s safety as our climate warms.
attributes.background: As UK heatwaves worsen, staff must often work in unsafe high temperatures. Unlike the legal minimum, there’s no set maximum. We call for a legal max (e.g. 30°C, or 27°C for strenuous work) and mandatory measures like air con, ventilation and cooling breaks to protect workers’ health.

rejection.details:
